Name: Sable Helmet
Description: A sturdy helmet crafted from black steel. Protects your head from blows and looks intimidating.

Name: Onyx Visor
Description: A sleek visor made of black onyx. Grants extra protection to the wearer's head.

Name: Shadow Hood
Description: A hood made of black silk that seems to absorb light. Enhances the wearer's ability to dodge attacks.

Name: Nightfall Crown
Description: A crown made of black diamonds that glimmers in the moonlight. Grants the wearer exceptional endurance.

Name: Raven Helm
Description: A helmet made of black leather and adorned with raven feathers. Provides basic protection and looks stylish.

Name: Obsidian Mask
Description: A mask made of black obsidian that seems to absorb magical energy. Increases the wearer's resistance to spells.

Name: Darkness Veil
Description: A veil made of black lace that shimmers with dark magic. Enhances the wearer's ability to cast spells.

Name: Nightshade Cap
Description: A cap made of black wool that smells of nightshade. Restores the wearer's health.

Name: Eclipse Helm
Description: A helmet made of black iron that seems to absorb light. Increases the wearer's physical attack power.

Name: Void Crown
Description: A crown made of black crystals that seems to warp space. Increases the wearer's ability to use special abilities.

Name: Nightmare Mask
Description: A mask made of black leather that seems to be alive. Grants the wearer exceptional endurance.

Name: Dark Crown
Description: A crown made of black metal that seems to radiate darkness. Provides extra protection to the wearer's head.

Name: Black Velvet Hat
Description: A dashing hat reminiscent of a bygone era that raises your evade by 10 points!

Name: Black Leather Hood
Description: A mysterious hood that provides extra defense in battle.

Name: Black Feathered Cap
Description: A stylish cap adorned with black feathers that makes you feel more agile.

Name: Black Wool Beret
Description: A warm beret made of black wool that provides comfort in harsh weather.

Name: Black Silk Top Hat
Description: A magnificent top hat made of black silk that provides extra magic defense.

Name: Black Leather Cap
Description: A sturdy cap made of black leather that provides extra endurance.

Name: Black Pirate's Hat
Description: A stylish pirate made of black felt that provides extra self esteem!

Name: Black Woolen Cap
Description: A simple cap made of black wool that provides basic protection.

Name: Black Leather Tricorn Hat
Description: A stylish tricorn hat made of black leather that makes you more evasive.
